scripts.global: echo '=> Installing dependend packages' && npm install -g bower pm2 mocha standard istanbul markdown-html good-mocha-html-reporter raml2html jsdoc less jade html-minifier uglify-js uglifycss imagemin-cli jade-lint jsonlint-cli && echo '=> Installing dependend packages OK'
scripts.lint: echo '=> Linting Files' && npm run lint:jade && npm run lint:less && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:json && echo '=> Linting Files OK'
scripts.lint:jade: echo -n '==> Linting JADE ...' && jade-lint assets/html/*.jade && echo 'OK'
scripts.lint:less: echo -n '==> Linting LESS ...' && lessc --lint assets/css/*.less && echo 'OK'
scripts.lint:json: echo -n '==> Linting JSON ...' && jsonlint-cli package.json && echo 'OK'
scripts.test: echo '=> Performing Tests'  && istanbul cover _mocha -- tests/* -R good-mocha-html-reporter  && echo '=> Performing Tests OK'
scripts.doc: echo '=> Creating Docs' && npm run doc:istanbul && npm run doc:markdown && npm run doc:mocha && npm run doc:raml && npm run doc:jsdoc && echo '=> Creating Docs OK'
scripts.doc:istanbul: echo -n '==> Creating Coverage ...' && rsync -avq coverage/ doc/coverage/ && rm -rf coverage/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:markdown: echo -n '==> Creating HTML ...' && markdown-html doc/README.md -o doc/index.html && markdown-html README.md -o doc/readme.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:mocha: echo -n '==> Creating Testreports ...' && mv report.html doc/mocha.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:raml: echo -n '==> Creating API-Doc ...' && raml2html doc/api.raml > doc/rest.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.doc:jsdoc: echo -n '==> Creating JSDoc ...' && jsdoc lib/* routes/* tests/* app.js -d doc/jsdoc/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.assets: echo '=> Deploying Website Assets' && npm run assets:baseline && npm run assets:html && npm run assets:js && npm run assets:css && npm run assets:images && echo '=> Deploying Website Assets OK'
scripts.assets:baseline: echo -n '==> Preparing Folders ...' && mkdir -p public && mkdir -p tmp && rm -rf public/* &&  npm run assets:cleantmp && mkdir -p public/css && mkdir -p public/flags && mkdir -p public/js && mkdir -p public/images && mkdir -p public/fonts && echo 'OK'
scripts.assets:html: echo -n '==> Deploying HTML ...' && jade assets/html/index.jade -o public/ > /dev/null && echo 'OK'
scripts.assets:js: echo -n '==> Deploying JS ...' && cp assets/js/*.js public/js/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.assets:css: echo -n '==> Deploying CSS ...' && lessc assets/css/main.less public/css/main.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.assets:images: echo -n '==> Deploying Images ...' && cp assets/images/* public/images/ 2>>/dev/null | true && echo 'OK'
scripts.bower: echo '=> Deploying Bower Assets' && echo '==> Bower install' && bower install --allow-root && npm run bower:bootstrap && npm run bower:flag-icons && npm run bower:font-awesome && npm run bower:glyphicons && npm run bower:angular && echo '=> Deploying Bower Assets OK'
scripts.bower:bootstrap: echo -n '==> Deploying Bootstrap ...' && cp bower_components/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css public/css/bootstrap.min.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.bower:flag-icons: echo -n '==> Deploying Flag-Icons ...' && cp bower_components/flag-icon-css/css/flag-icon.min.css public/css/flag-icon.min.css && cp -r bower_components/flag-icon-css/flags/* public/flags && echo 'OK'
scripts.bower:font-awesome: echo -n '==> Deploying Font-Awesome ...' && cp bower_components/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css public/css/font-awesome.min.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.bower:glyphicons: echo -n '==> Deploying glyphicons ...' && cp bower_components/bootstrap/fonts/* public/fonts/ && echo 'OK'
scripts.bower:angular: echo '==> Deploying angular' && cp bower_components/angular/angular.min.js public/js/angular.min.js && npm run bower:angular:cookies && echo '==> Deploying angular OK'
scripts.bower:angular:cookies: echo -n '===> Deploying angular-cookies ...' && cp bower_components/angular-cookies/angular-cookies.min.js public/js/angular-cookies.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify: echo '=> Verifying Deployment Process' && npm run verify:html && npm run verify:js && npm run verify:css && npm run verify:images && npm run verify:server && echo '=> Verifying Deployment Process OK'
scripts.verify:html: echo -n '==> Verifying HTML ...' && test -e public/index.html && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:js: echo -n '==> Verifying JS ...' && test -e public/js/verbshaker.js && test -e public/js/angular.min.js && test -e public/js/angular-cookies.min.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:css: echo -n '==> Verifying CSS ...' && test -e public/css/main.css && test -e public/css/bootstrap.min.css && test -e public/css/font-awesome.min.css && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:images: echo -n '==> Verifying Images ...' && test -e public/images/android-chrome-192x192.png && test -e public/images/android-chrome-512x512.png && test -e public/images/apple-touch-icon.png && test -e public/images/browserconfig.xml && test -e public/images/favicon-16x16.png && test -e public/images/favicon-32x32.png && test -e public/images/favicon.ico && test -e public/images/manifest.json && test -e public/images/mstile-70x70.png && test -e public/images/mstile-144x144.png && test -e public/images/mstile-150x150.png && test -e public/images/safari-pinned-tab.svg && echo 'OK'
scripts.verify:server: echo -n '==> Verifying Server ...' && test -e app.js && test -e libs/proverbs.js && test -e libs/proverbCollection.js && test -e routes/proverbs.js && test -e routes/index.js && echo 'OK'
scripts.deploy:
echo '=> Deploying myVerses' && npm run global && npm install && npm run lint && npm run assets && npm run bower && npm run test && npm run doc && npm run verify && echo '<= READY TO START! =>
TYPE `npm start` to startup the Server'
